description: A specialized vehicle, the "Acme Bumaway," is positioned in a public park, aiming a large, vacuum-like tube at a person resting on a bench. This scene presents an absurd and surreal solution to the presence of individuals in public spaces. The literal "bumaway" machine employs dark irony, suggesting a mechanistic and dehumanizing approach to complex social issues. The operation contrasts sharply with the peaceful environment of the park bench.

other_text.location: On the side of the large tank on the vehicle
Bottom right corner of the panel
